summary: A nice hide away in Riverwood... Complete with Bazaar, and LOTS of items. Requires DG and HS.
descriptionHtml:
The Riverwood Hideaway is a hidden home and shop for the Breton Kids. They are older than they seem. They specialize in stealth, information, & magic. 

This adds a bazaar for you to buy things, and sell things. 

You have a few trainers here as well.

There is a garden here, and they are fairly open about such things.

You are free to spend the night, but just so it is clear, it is THEIR home, and you are a guest. If you find storage, it\'s for them, not you. (Storage is NOT safe)

Requirements :
This requires Dawnguard 
This requires Hearthfires
author: Pan Dragondagger --- aka -  Rex1029
